column4: i'm thinking about installing ubuntu.. last time i install linux i had to configure swap.. do you still have to do that with ubuntu during the install process?
what are the limitations with vmware?
run windows applications like photoshop and some poker clients i use
what can't it out of that list?
well if i don't use photoshop.. could it cope with the poker clients?
well if it can't even cope with poker clients.. what is vmware designed to cope with?
can u give me some examples of things it can cope with so i can compare it with what i know
can u give me an example of a big application it can cope with so i can compare it to the poker clients
you don't know any or you don't want to give me an example?
ahh ok.. how do i install windows to vmware?
you can install directly from a iso rather than burning it to cd? as that would suit me more
ah great.. you just saved me about 50 hours of pain
when using vmware for winxp.. can window still access my linux partitions ?
